horizontalAlignment.description: Aligns a grid item inside a cell along the inline (row) axis. Defaults to "stretch"

verticalAlignment.description: Aligns a grid item inside a cell along the block (column) axis. Defaults to "stretch"

sticky.description: Defines if the item should stick to the edges of its container. Defaults to "false"

margin.description: Defines the margin around the component. It can be specified as a number (which acts as a multiplier) or a string representing the margin value. Default is `0`.

padding.description: Defines the padding within the component. It can be specified as a number (which acts as a multiplier) or a string representing the padding value. Default is `0`.

as.description: The HTML element used for the root node.
